Characterizing the Service of Academy and Academy Preparatory School Attendees
Service as a cadet at the United States Military, Air Force, or Coast Guard Academy, or as a midshipman at the United States Naval Academy is characterized as active duty.
Use the table below when determining the characterization of service for individuals who attended the
United States Military Academy Preparatory School
United States Air Force Academy Preparatory School, or
United States Naval Academy Preparatory School.
